The focus of policy related advocy measures include issu that are important in the implementation of the development policy such as effectiveness and modalities of development cooperation. The development measures of the unit relate to the entire ministry and include development of new instruments and working modalities planning and follow-up and related trav el of experts and organization of seminars. Financing is also extended to support the continuous training of the unit staff in matters that relate to development policy and development cooperation. The capacity building of the entire Ministry for Foreign A ffairs staff is supported by enabling the participation of locally hired development cooperation staff in the development policy training.
